sentences.en: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 援助物资正在送往受地震影响最严重的地区。

sentences.cn: 在最坏的情况下，伤员得在医院躺上几个月。

sentences.en: Environmental problems they found in Poland were among the worst they encountered.
sentences.cn: 他们在波兰发现的环境问题是他们遇到过的最严重的。

sentences.en: Hope for the best and prepare for the worst.
sentences.cn: [谚语]寄予乐观的希望，作最坏的准备。

sentences.en: I judged it to be one of the worst programmes ever screened.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是有史以来播出的最烂的节目之一。

sentences.en: I make it no secret that our worst consultants earn nothing.
sentences.cn: 我可以坦白地说，我们最差的顾问挣不到一分钱。

sentences.en: I'm a natural pessimist; I usually expect the worst.
sentences.cn: 我是天生的悲观主义者。我总是做最坏的打算。

sentences.en: In the worst-case scenario, you could become a homeless person.
sentences.cn: 最坏的情况是你可能会无家可归。

sentences.en: It was absolutely the worst food I have ever had.
sentences.cn: 这绝对是我吃过的最糟糕的食物。

sentences.en: let them do their worst—he would never surrender.
sentences.cn: 让他们有什么手段尽管使出来吧——他永不投降。

sentences.en: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
sentences.cn: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.en: nothing's working at the moment, so I suppose you've seen us at our worst.
sentences.cn: 那时一切都不在运转，因此我觉得你看到的是我们最糟的时候。

sentences.en: Sarajevo took one of its worst poundings in weeks.
sentences.cn: 萨拉热窝遭受了几个星期以来最严重的一次破坏。

sentences.en: The doctors didn't mince their words, and predicted the worst.
sentences.cn: 医生直言相告，并做了最坏的预测。

sentences.en: The floods are described as the worst in nearly fifty years.
sentences.cn: 这次洪灾据说是近50年来最为严重的。

sentences.en: The New England team are the worst in the league.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰队是联盟中最差的队。

sentences.en: The worst of the storm is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 最猛烈的暴风雨就要来了。

sentences.en: The worst part of the set-up is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.cn: 安装时最糟糕就是操作指南讲述不够清楚。

sentences.en: The worst thing is when you call friends and they've gone out.
sentences.cn: 最糟糕的事情是，你给朋友打电话，而他们却出去了。

sentences.en: There’s no reason why I should be one of the worst!
sentences.cn: 这样讲毫无理由，我怎么可能是最差的攀岩者！

sentences.en: They have joined the job market at the worst possible time.
sentences.cn: 他们在最不景气的时候进入了就业市场。

sentences.en: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
sentences.cn: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.en: Though mine safety has much improved, miners' families still fear the worst.
sentences.cn: 尽管矿井的安全状况有了很大改善，矿工的家属仍然害怕最糟的情况会发生。

sentences.en: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
